title: Farmers Natural Food Supermarket
description: Stocks fresh organic produce, prepared foods like tofu and pickled vegetables, soy products, imported packaged grains like oatmeal, muesli and quinoa, fresh baked bread, and traditional Japanese food items such as seaweed, noodles, rice, sauces and spices. Not all veg.
streetAddress: south side of Marutamachi-dori , east of Kawaramachi-dori
